channel.title: Drop on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Drop on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Drop
item.description: She has Weltered walls. Shattering along Her weighted depth. Lighting dashes above. My shadow. Cascades. On Her metal Skin. I pull myself. Sword in hand. Up. Shattered. Wailing light. With careless effort, She Laughs at me. I push Up. She crashes around me. My rusted nails bite into her wasted root. I know Iâ€™m not the first. My own armored skin weighs me down. With great flair she brushes And shrugs.
